description: AC Step 8.3.6: Examine the Text File Before Importing
name: AC Step 8.3.6

balooActions.text: From the right pane of File Explorer, right-click the file named a08h3Propnew, and from the shortcut menu, click Open with, click Notepad.

Press TAB until the right pane of File Explorer is the focus (if necessary). Press ARROW keys to select the file named a08h3Propnew. Press SHIFT+F10, H (or ARROW to select Open with), press RIGHT ARROW or ENTER, or ARROW to select Notepad, and press ENTER.

actions.balooActionText: Press TAB until the right pane of File Explorer is the focus (if necessary). Press ARROW keys to select the file named a08h3Propnew. Press SHIFT+F10, H (or ARROW to select Open with), press RIGHT ARROW or ENTER, or ARROW to select Notepad, and press ENTER.
actions.name: pressKey()

balooActions.text: From the right pane of File Explorer, click the file named a08h3Propnew.
On the Home tab, in the Open group, click the Open arrow and then click Notepad.

actions.balooActionText: On the Home tab, in the Open group, click the Open arrow and then click Notepad.
actions.name: clickAndWait()

balooActions.text: Press TAB until the right pane of File Explorer is the focus (if necessary). Press ARROW keys to select the file named a08h3Propnew. Press ALT (or F10), H, PE, TAB or ARROW to select Notepad, then press ENTER.

actions.balooActionText: Press TAB until the right pane of File Explorer is the focus (if necessary). Press ARROW keys to select the file named a08h3Propnew. Press ALT (or F10), H, PE, TAB or ARROW to select Notepad, then press ENTER.
actions.name: pressKey()

items.text: In File Explorer, open the a08h3Propnew.csv file with Notepad and review the data.
